phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
After the Star Festival, the king made a very important announcement.
The Eye of the Midnight Sun's hideout has been located.
We are going to launch an all-out attack on the enemy!
I have decided to gather an even more select group from the Magic Knights
to form the ultimate hand-picked unit.
They will be called... the Royal Knights!
A test involving all of the Magic Knights
for a chance to join the Royal Knights was about to begin!
We finally return from our expedition, and now this.
Do anything else, and you will be obstructing public duties.
As a Magic Knight, I will have to dispose of you.
Do you have any idea who this is?
Vice Captain of the Purple Orcas Xerx Lugner
This is the Vice Captain of the Purple Orcas, Lord Xerx Lugner!
His power and virtue are what made the Purple Orcas who they are today!
He is the Saint of Pure Ice!
Why the hell would I know about this pompous jackass?
Where is this ice of yours, then?
He looks more like a zombie covered in mud to me.
Two-bit flunkies should not be boasting about supposed glories.
Is your great master there such a piece of trash that he needs you
Must be nice being such a bigshot.
You can say whatever the hell you want about things you do not like.
Try to strike me down in the name of justice with this all-powerful magic of yours,
great vice captain of some band of thugs who likes to throw his weight around.
How dare you insult the Magic Knights?
I shall make you regret your very existence with my magic!
Yet you lost to someone like me?
Your title as vice captain is obviously a joke.
That Magic Knight's robe is wasted on you.
Let us see if there is anyone else around worth humiliating even more.
I do not know what kind of exam it is, but I am all fired up!
I can finally show everyone my true powers!
I beg your pardon, but even that level of power
is enough to disturb the people around you,
so could you consider calming down a bit?
The Golden Dawn 5th Class Intermediate Magic Knight Mimosa Vermillion
I hear she is an expert at healing and support,
but she is been learning attack spells lately, too.
So she is a jack of all trades?
Mimosa, do not start any trouble before the exam.
Pointing out the lower magic level of someone who is your elder...
I see you are as obliviously rude as ever.
And you are so serious, a worrywart, and a four-eyes, Klaus.
The Golden Dawn 3rd Class Intermediate Magic Knight Klaus Lunettes
He is powered up a lot in the past few months, and his steel magic
is real tough to break through.
I heard he is also working out.
The Golden Dawn 5th Class Intermediate Magic Knight Yuno
That is... the number one rookie this year!
We had a date today, Yuno!
Then promise you will take me out on a date tomorrow!
The day after tomorrow works, too!
I do not know what will happen that far into the future.
Now I am going to mess up your hair!
The Golden Dawn 2nd Class Intermediate Magic Knight Hamon Caseus
Well, are not they a delight, Alecdora?
The Golden Dawn 4th Class Senior Magic Knight Alecdora Sandler
So many other top contenders that we all know!
There is a good chance a bunch of the Golden Dawn's members are going to pass this exam.
The Golden Dawn Vice Captain Langris Vaude
Everyone seems quite on edge, do not they?
They should all relax a little bit more.
I have been working out and getting stronger!
I will not lose to you!
L-L-Let us give it our all!
Hey, your face is a little red.
I am nervous since I have not seen him in so, so, so, so, so, so long!
I see you are as loud as ever.
Were not the hot springs great the other day?
What is this about hot springs, Yuno?
I lost to you in that race up the volcano,
but I will not lose to you today, Yuno!
Did you do some image training to prepare for when you fail today?
We would not want you crying.
Y-Yuno, what is this about hot springs?
You seem to be having fun, Yuno.
What is this about hot springs?!
The Crimson Lion Kings 2nd Class Intermediate Magic Knight Leopold Vermillion
I am the one who is going to pass this exam!
Seriously, what is this about hot springs?!
I guess I just have to give it all I can.
You have got some nerve wearing a Black Bulls robe, jerk face.
I do not know who you are, but want to fight?
I wanted to pump myself up, so I changed up my hairstyle!
You want to change your hairstyle?
If you changed your hairstyle every time you got dumped,
you would not have any hair left.
In all seriousness, I wanted to pump myself up.
I have got just the thing!
I wanted a fresh start, so I came here with a new hairstyle.
Like that wuss would ever come here.
I am not lying, and I have seniority here!
But I think that is a bit over the top.
The fact that you changed your hairstyle to pump yourself up is over the top!
The fact that you frosted your tips is way over the top.
Who cares if it is over the top?!
I am only human! by Finral.
The Silver Eagles 3rd Class Intermediate Magic Knight Solid Silva
You came to embarrass us again?
When you lose so miserably, it tarnishes the Silva family name.
Her magic was refined beyond belief,
Your magic is so crude and unsightly, it is hard to believe you are royalty.
And that is why you must surpass her.
N-Now, if you will excuse me...
I am going to show my brothers and sister that I have grown!
Thank you all for gathering here today.
Now, let us begin the Royal Knights Selection Exam.
I shall explain the details of the exam.
The King of the Clover Kingdom Augustus Kira Clover XIII
I am royalty, and this is the Royal Knights Selection Exam, after all.
All of you, work harder to make me more popular with the people.
of a team competition: a magic crystal destruction battle tournament!
What kind of rules does that have?
We are not going head-to-head with each other?
Do not make the rules too complicated, okay?
Protect your own team's crystal, which will be placed in your area,
and destroy the other team's crystal.
The first team to do this wins!
If no team is able to destroy a crystal within the 30-minute time limit,
the one that has done the most damage to its target wins.
Er... We have chosen this format because...
In battles against the Eye of the Midnight Sun,
several squads will have to work together.
We thought this would be the best way to measure
the cooperation and strategy skills you will need at times like that,
rather than simply fighting with brute force.
Also, I bet I will get to see lots of their non-combat spells this way, too.
Which means we will have to team up with members of the other squads.
Now, let us announce the teams.
I am on the same team as Mimosa!
I-I am on the same team as Asta?!
I am happy, I am oh so happy,
I need to concentrate on the exam!
But again, what is this about hot springs?!
But I bet our great Wizard King will forgive me for being a tiny bit late.
Man, I just happened to run into a little old lady in distress.
I helped her out, since I am a Magic Knight, so I ended up a little late.
Is the old lady all right?
What are you trying to pull, you bastard?
How dare you act like that after arriving late?
The Wizard King is one of the only guys Sis respects!
What do you think you are doing to the Wizard King?!
I guess everyone respects the Wizard King.
Do not push your values on me, you worthless rabble.
Looks like he gave himself quite the makeover after that long expedition of his.
This is no laughing matter, sir!
Well, it looks like we are on the same team,
The stinkiest bug in all the Clover Kingdom, the rainbow stinkbug.
I am being assaulted by the scent of the rainbow!
Are you actually trying to get along with me?!
Why would I bother getting along with an airhead with a moronic face,
who is a hyperactive dumbass, too?
You are just a noisy shrimp.
You jerk with a cool-looking thing wrapped around your face!
Are you even trying at all?!
Looks like all you can do is try.
Did not you come here to get chosen as a Royal Knight?!
I came here to make fun of you people.
He is not at all like the rumors.
I heard he was the Saint of Pure Ice,
but he is been stationed in the borderlands, so only a few people actually know him.
Are you really okay with this?
I do not want to be on the same team as this guy!
We are all Magic Knights here, so let us all just get along.
Have not you forgotten about me?
C Team Sol Marron Magna Swing Kirsch Vermillion
Who the heck is this tiny delinquent?
Do not make me smack those lame glasses off your face!
How about I bury you in the ground to make you a little shorter?!
P Team En Ringard Noelle Silva Yuno
So I am with the noisy little girl who is always with Asta.
But just so you know, Yuno belongs to me.
Do not you dare lay a finger on him.
I am on the same team as the lofty guy who is Asta's childhood friend?
Do not even think about getting in the way!
If you dare hold Yuno back, I will make you regret it!
K Team Puli Angel Luck Voltia Klaus Lunettes
I am on the same team as the self-centered Luck, the Cheery Berserker?
Let us work together and do our best!
We are going to be great teammates!
E Team Finral Roulacase Leopold Vermillion Hamon Caseus
I-Is this team going to be okay?
O Team Dimitri Blint Solid Silva Alecdora Sandler
I am not a fan of yours, but you do have skill, so I guess I can live with it.
Do not go running off to act on your own.
All right, let us head over to the main stage.
Cob, I am counting on you.
Magic Knight Who Accompanies the Wizard King Cob Poltapot
This is the stage for the crystal destruction tournament?!
The battlefield has a wide range of different areas.
Use them to display your powers to the fullest.
And here is the tournament chart, which we determined by lottery in advance.
Battle wins and losses will not directly affect whether you pass or fail.
That said, the more you win, the more you will be able to show your true skills.
Since you have the chance, I hope you all strive to win.
I am facing off with Solid's team right off the bat?
I will happily finish you off myself, Noelle.
If we win the first round, I will be facing off with Langris.
So we would take on Yuno's team in the finals, huh?
I am going to win until then, no matter what!
No, I am going to win this whole thing!
All right, we are about to begin round one.
Though I am sure this goes without saying, make sure you guys do not kill anyone!
Let me stand out some more!
We have got a high-level recovery mage on standby, so fight to your hearts' content!
My arms are all better now!
I am sorry I worried you!
The beautiful ladies of the Black Bulls came to cheer you on!
I will do my best cheering!
But are you sure it was okay for all of you to come at once?
The captain gave us a heartfelt send-off.
We are actually just about to start.
So Asta's team is the first round?
Well, that is definitely fitting for him.
You would better show them who is boss!
At this rate, I am going to miss my meal-saving prince's heroic deeds!
What is This About Hot Springs!?
What is This About Hot Springs?!
Were not the hot springs great the other day?
What is this about hot springs, Yuno?
Is it a secret just between you two?
A bit below the back of my right ear.
It is your turn next, Yuno.
Then they draw words on each other's backs!
Looks like she got overheated just thinking about the hot springs.
Our battle is about to begin.
I, Mimosa Vermillion, will do my best not to get in anyone's way!
Black Clover, Page 74: Flower of Resolution.
I will make my flower bloom.
